main event: A bright, round green object was observed in the sky over Fort Yukon, Alaska on December 6, 1960.
interesting points: The object appeared as a light the size of a basketball, traveling on a steady course of 20-230 degrees, ascending and descending almost instantaneously.
The object was observed for 37 minutes.
A similar bright, round object was reported in the sky over Fort Yukon, Alaska on December 13, 1954, moving at a high rate of speed.
Another sighting in the Fort Yukon area occurred on June 28, 1957, with a civilian observer reporting a round, green object the size of a baseball.
The weather conditions during the sightings were clear and cold, with temperatures around -25°F to -37°F.
sighted object: round, green object the size of a basketball or baseball
